publicationStmt.p: The archival materials within this document were used with the permission of the materials’ owner, the University of Nebraska–Lincoln Libraries Archives & Special Collections. The materials are not for distribution and/or reproduction.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Nebraska–Lincoln Libraries Archives & Special Collections

figure.figDesc: Scan of two pencil drawings. Depicts two young children. The figure on the left appears to be a toddler, wearing a short dress with a bow on the back and diaper. The toddler’s left hand hold a stuffed animal. The type of animal is undetermined. The figure on the right, is a slightly older child. The child has a short bob with bangs. They are wearing a dress with a jacket. In their left hand is pamphlet or paper of somesort whereas in there right hand is a circular object. Back of the scan is blank.
